title: My Favorite Murder on The Silence of the Lambs
itunes:title: My Favorite Murder on The Silence of the Lambs
description:
Podcast worlds collide today with a very special crossover episode with Karen Kilgariff and Georgia Hardstark of My Favorite Murder. As a loyal murderino himself, Chuck was beside himself to get them into the LA studio for a long talk about podcasting, comedy, trick ankles and Chuck's special pick for this episode, The Silence of the Lambs. Listen in as three podcasting giants dive deep on the best serial killer movie ever made. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
